items.sentence: I know you\'ve been waiting a long time, but could you wait just a little bit longer?
She advised him to see the dentist, but he said he didn\'t have enough time to do so.
It doesn\'t matter how smart you are. If you don\'t work hard, you\'ll never succeed.
I\'m beginning to believe that we\'ll never be able to convince Tom that he\'s wrong.
Why shouldn\'t truth be stranger than fiction? Fiction, after all, has to make sense.
It may seem like a crazy idea, but I think we should go visit Tom and Mary right now.
Make your airplane reservations early since flights fill up quickly around Christmas.
I\'m no longer quite sure what the question is, but I do know that the answer is yes.
I\'ve been agonizing over whether to do what Tom suggested or do what Mary suggested.
My father always speaks to me in French and my mother always speaks to me in English.
